name: magrent
author: Siavash Askari Nasr
description: This add-on converts magnet links, torrent hashes and Piratebay URLs to torrent files. It uses torrent storage services like Torrage.com for downloading torrent files.

preferences.name: torrentSource
preferences.title: Default torrent source
preferences.description: Will be used in 'Download torrent file' context menu item
